runs.comm: in swinging full delivery on the middle and leg, clipped past square leg
on the off and middle, again curving in, pushed to the on side of the pitch and Steyn picks it up on his follow-through
pushed across Gambhir who slashes it in the air, bat away from the body, but clear of backward point and will pick couple of runs.
moving towards off stump, defended to covers. Two deliveries that swung back in and two that have left Gambhir.
short and wide, Gambhir cuts it away through covers for the first boundary of the chase. It sat up on this slow track and Gambhir cut it front of square
full pitched around the off stump, pushed to left of mid-off for a single
slightly short in length, moving across, mistimes the cut to the off side
just outside off stump, short in length, Gambhir stays back, opens the bat-face and plays a lovely little late cut past the first slip
backs away a touch to flay the full delivery through covers. He charged down the track, moving outside leg stump in the process and drilled it through the off side
slightly slower, cutting in from outside off, Gambhir tries to dab it and inside-edges it to the on side of the pitch
fires the first short delivery of the chase but it doesn't climb all that high on this slow track, left alone
fuller, around the off stump, whipped to midwicket
fullish, on the middle stump line, eased to mid-off
around the off stump, full again, square driven to cover point for a single
from round the stumps, full in length and just outside off stump, Gambhir tires a flamboyant forcing hit through the off side, misses and the ball rushes past the off stump
around the off stump, edged to the off side, one look at Rohit who says yes let's take the single and off they go
length delivery just outside off stump, pushed out to point
short in length, on the hips, tucked to short fine-leg
just short of the blockhole, around the off and middle line, pushed to right of mid-off for a single
on the off stump line, steered through backward point region and AB puts in a despairing dive but can't reach
overpitched on the legs, Rohit whips it uppishly but through the midwicket gap and it will reach the boundary. Easy pickings.
short in length, around the off stump line, defended to cover
rushes down the track, goes for the big hit over the on-side field but mistimes it along the ground to mid-on.
slower one, just outside leg, ROhit checks his stroke and pushes it past square leg
full and outside off, goes for the big off drive and gets a thickish outside edge to third man where Albie makes a very fine diving stop.
short in length outside off stump, guided to right of Albie this time
short delivery, kicking up at the rib-cage even on this slow wicket and Rohit is in trouble; he hops to fend it away to short fine-leg region
from round the stumps, digs it in but this one doesn't climb much and Gambhir tucks it off his hips to square leg
backs away to the leg side, Morne fires it short and Rohit guides it to third man region
fuller, a tad slower, on the middle, turned to midwicket
low full toss on the middle and Rohit flicks it away superbly to the midwicket boundary. Not a great delivery obviously but put away in style.
tries the slower one this time but Rohit picks it up early and swings it high over wide midwicket for yet another boundary.
Yet another slower one attempted, chipped over wide mid-off region for couple of runs.
the yorker but on the leg stump line, off the pad to backward square leg
another slower one, on the leg stump line, dabbed to midwicket region
ah, yet another slow delivery, turned past square leg for a single
floated around the off stump, wristed past square leg
And spin does the trick right away. It was flighted around the off stump, Gambhir tried to chip it over extra cover but the ball spun to take the edge and flew towards deep cover
turns in from outside off, flicked to midwicket
spins in towards the off stump, punched to the bowler
fuller, driven to long-on
worked towards Van der Merwe at deep midwicket
leans forward to wrist it to left of midwicket for a single
dropped by Boucher. It was the drifter around the off stump, Raina played for the turn but it almost went straight on to take the edge but Bouch couldn't hold on.
driven down to long-on for a single
from round the stumps, slips down the leg side, runs off the pad to short fine-leg
runs down the track, Van der Merwe drags back the length and gets it to turn sharply past the prod and strikes the pad
fuller, on the middle and off, Raina tries to slog sweep it but drives along the ground to midwicket
slows up the pace, gently turns in, deflected to midwicket
turns in but from short of length and that allows Rohit to back away to cut it to sweeper cover
quicker, from round the stumps, goes on straight, punched to deep midwicket
slower through the air, tossed up, full, turned to midwicket
floated full outside off stump, swept to long leg for a single

Spin is king on this wicket. Botha lured Raina into the big hit with a well flighted delivery on the middle and leg stump. Raina went for the big slog sweep but was done in by the turn to edge it high to long-on. Gone! Another failure for the young man.
flighted on the leg and middle line, leans forward to defend and is hit on the pad
turns from the middle and leg line, Yuvraj tries to work it to the on side but it turns and he gets a leading edge to the off side
Almost bowled! Yuvraj lunged forward to defend, pushed outside the line of the ball that went between the bat and pad gap and somehow, just missed the off stump
And now almost caught by leaping Duminy. Again, done in by the turn. Yuvraj went to drive the flighted delivery but the spin induced the edge and he ended up chipping it over the bowler

SA are doing superbly here. Rohit falls to a spinner now. Very risky shot. He shuffled outside off stump and tried to flick it from there but ended up slicing a dolly of a catch to backward point. 56 for 3 and they are wobbling here. Enter the captain.
slips down the leg side and its' called a wide much to the surprise of Bouch and the bowler. They think it went off the pad. I will confirm after getting a replay
stretches forward to defend the off break
flighted full on the leg stump line, Yuvraj is hit on the pad, stretching forward to defend. And they yell for the lbw ...
quicker, still from round the stumps, cut to right of short third man
on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket, Dhoni thinks about a single before rushing back to his crease
turns towards middle stump, goes back to defend
flighted full on the off and middle line, on driven to wide long-on region
just outside off stump, punched to sweeper cover
from round the stumps, turns from middle stump, tries to push it to the off side and ends up edging it away
fuller and leans forward to drive to cover
quicker but shorter as well and that allows Dhoni to go on the back foot to punch it to deep cover
goes for the reverse sweep, against the turn, and edges it to the on side
flatter, outside off stump, tries the slog sweep but end up dragging it to deep midwicket
gets forward but yorks himself in the process and stabs it away to the on side
moving in towards the leg and middle line, tucked to deep backward square leg and Van der Merwe fires in a direct hit at the strikers' end
length delivery that stops a touch on Dhoni who jabs it to the on side of the pitch
bangs it in short, outside off stump, Dhoni hops to mistime the pull to short midwicket
fuller, on the middle stump, flicked to fine-leg for a single
126.8 kmph slow yorker, Yuvraj had moved outside leg and ended up lunging across to keep it out to the off side

Dhoni is run out. Yuvraj is stunned that Dhoni even ran for it. It slipped down the leg side, a wide, it runs to Boucher who doesn't collect it cleanly but the ball didn't roll away too far from him. He just took couple of steps and he had the ball.  Dhoni was more than half-way down the track and Boucher relayed the throw to the bowler who took a few steps before calmly under-arming a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Yuvraj looks very surprised.
on the hips, turned to fine-leg for a single
turns in from outside off, dabbed towards deep midwicket for a single
sharp turn from the middle and off line and Yusuf is beaten, getting a leading edge to backward point.

South Africa climb all over India who spin away towards the abyss. Yuvraj stands alone. It was flighted delivery around the off stump, perhaps stopped a touch on Yusuf who pushed it tamely to cover. South Africa roar.
Slip in place now. It was the quicker delivery on the off stump line, defended to the off side

almost bowled. How did that miss the off stump? It turned from the middle stump line, Harbhajan tried to wrist it away to the off side, exposing the sticks, misses and it bounces past the off stump. Agony for the bowler.
goes for the traditional sweep shot and will pick up a single
full in length, pushed towards mid-off and they rush across for the quick single. Botha's throw misses the stumps at the non-striker's end but Harbhajan would have made it
Crashed to midwicket boundary. Steyn dug it short of length and Yuvraj, who was trying to dab and nudge against the turn, plays a flamboyant pull shot
moves outside leg stump, Steyn follows him with a slower one, pushed down to long-on
moves outside leg stump, has a good old-slog over midwicket but no wood on leather. Boucher collects.
What an athletic stop from Boucher. It was a wild full toss down the leg side, past Harbhajan who turns around to see if it runs for four byes but Boucher dives full stretch to make a great stop
Steyn digs it in short, doesn't climb all that high, Harbhajan takes out the front leg from the line and slaps it high over extra cover
goes for the yorker, slips in a low full toss, swatted to midwicket
spins in towards middle and leg, tries to flick it but is hit on the pad
Tired of nudging around, Yuvraj waltzes down the track, goes down on his knee to slog sweep it high over midwicket boundary for a six.
turns in from a length, towards the leg stump line, runs off the pad to the on side
short in length, outside off stump, cut away to deep cover
spins in towards middle and leg, Yuvraj goes right back to work it to backward square leg
goes for the big sweep but can't connect well and it bounds away to the off side
length delivery, from round the stumps, tapped to backward point for a single and hold on, they take another for the overthrow at the non-striker's end
145.2 bouncer and Yuvraj goes for the pull, perhaps too early on this slow track and is hit on the left shoulder
Wallop! Harbhajan Singh moved down the track and towards the leg side and thrashed the slower length delivery over long-on boundary. The Indian section in the crowd clear their throat.
fires it in full around leg stump, Harbhajan tries to swing it to the on side, misses and it rolls to left of Boucher. Harbhajan wanted a single but Yuvraj sends him back
moves outside leg, tries to heave it over midwicket but the ball bounces over the stumps to Boucher.
shuffles to the off side, tries to paddle sweep but is struck on the pad. The ball rolls to the on side.
low dipping full toss outside off stump, Harbhajan goes for the slog sweep but misses it and the ball rolls to the on side .. Yuvraj wants a single but Dhoni says no.
Botha takes out Harbhajan with another full dipping toss. Harbhajan swung it straight to midwicket
on the leg stump line, on driven for a single
Botha keeps bowling those full tosses here! Yuvraj swats it to deep midwicket region
and now drifts to the pads, swept away for couple of runs.
lovely loopy delivery on the middle has Yuvraj lunging out to stab it to point region. He retains the strike.
yorker length outside off stump, Yuvraj raises his bat to go for the big drive but allows it pass through to Boucher. PErhaps, he was thinking it might go for a wide but it wasn't that wide.

Big wicket. It was a similar delivery to the previous one; another yorker length delivery outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to square drive initially, gets the bat down in a hurry in the end to jab it away and it deflected to Boucher who dived to his left to take it. The bowler appeals for a catch. Bowden is not sure and goes upstairs. The ball bounced just before the bat hit the ground and the ball took the edge to Boucher, who took it cleanly. The verdict is out.
Smith fails to run out Zaheer. yorker again, dug out towards cover and they scamper across. Smith with the throw but misses the stumps at the non-striker's end. And they turn back for another run
full pitched, not quite a yorker this time, sliced off the outer edge to deep backward point region
Zaheer holes out to AB at long-on. It was full, not yorker length,  and Zaheer got under the ball and lofted it high but couldn't clear AB. And then they were two.
full delivery, driven to deep cover region for a single
length delivery outside off stump, Jadeja mistimes the drive to extra cover
moves outside leg stump, follows him with a yorker length, just short of the blockhole perhaps, squeezed to backward point region
low full toss, Jadeja can't get much power behind his heave but will pick up couple of runs to wide long-on region
full pitched around the off stump line, driven to long-on for a single.
moves outside leg stump, a very low dipping full toss on the off stump, edged away to third man
And South Africa win the battle of spin today. India suffer their third straight loss. It was full delivery, driven to deep cover.
